Residental aged care

The care you need, a life you love

Life at Bethany Christian Care is different from other aged care facilities. Youâ€™ll get the â€˜Bethanyâ€™ style of care thatâ€™s delivered with love and compassion.

Our dedicated team of care and support staff will serve you so you can live abundantly.

Our model of care

Aged care at Bethany Care is different from other aged care facilities in that we operate on a lifestyle model of care rather than a medical model.

Respite care

We offer short-term stays for people who need additional support for a time.

This might be recovering after surgery, or for those seeing if Bethany Christian Care is the home for them before they decide to move in permanently.

Secure dementia care

At Beth Eden and The Plains, we offer secure care for people who are living with dementia. These include homely rooms and secure outdoor spaces with state-of-the-art, dementia-friendly features.

Dedicated team that cares for you like family

Our team of dedicated care and support staff sets us apart. All of our staff members have a genuine desire to serve our residents so they can live abundantly.
